mapper.select: SELECT li.id, li.NAME as name, li.image, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM studio_info si WHERE si.lession_id = li.id AND del_flag =#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ) AS reciteNum, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM studio_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND lession_id = li.id ) = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END ) AS reciteState , (select count(1) from studio_info where lession_id=li.id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}) as completeNum, lcb.create_time as issueTime, li.unit as unit FROM lession_class_bind lcb JOIN lession_info li ON li.id = lcb.lession_id AND li.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE lcb.class_id = ( SELECT class_id FROM `user` WHERE id = #{userId} ) ORDER BY issueTime desc,unit LIMIT #{skip},#{limit}
select * from lession_info where id=#{id} and del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
SELECT count(1) FROM lession_info WHERE id IN ( SELECT lession_id FROM lession_class_bind WHERE class_id = (select class_id from user where id= #{userId}) AND del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} )

SELECT li.id, `name`, content, image, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM studio_info WHERE type = 1 AND lession_id = li.id AND del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}) AS completeNum, lcb.create_time AS issueTime, li.example_url AS exampleUrl, li.t_studio_url AS tStudioUrl, li.t_content AS tContent, ( (SELECT count( 1 ) FROM studio_info WHERE lession_id = #{id} and user_id=#{userId} and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}) > 0) as reciteState , li.creater as creater
FROM lession_info li JOIN lession_class_bind lcb ON lcb.lession_id = li.id AND lcb.class_id=(select class_id from user where id=#{userId} and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}) WHERE li.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND lcb.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND li.id=#{id}
